author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...DISTURBANCE DRIFTING NORTHWESTWARD OFF THE COAST OF SOUTH  CAROLINA... ...EXPECTED TO BRING GUSTY WINDS, HEAVY RAINS, AND COASTAL  FLOODING TO PORTIONS OF THE CAROLINAS...
summary:
...DISTURBANCE DRIFTING NORTHWESTWARD OFF THE COAST OF SOUTH  CAROLINA... ...EXPECTED TO BRING GUSTY WINDS, HEAVY RAINS, AND COASTAL  FLOODING TO PORTIONS OF THE CAROLINAS...
 As of 2:00 AM EDT Mon Sep 16
 the center of Eight was located near 32.2, -78.1
 with movement NW at 3 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1005 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Potential Tropical Cyclone Eight (AT3/AL082024)
